bot_config {"Bullet": "WOW"}
insert_channel {"id": 1, "user_id": 1, "name": "foobar", "prefix": "+", "bot_name": "hortbot", "active": true}

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+command add pan FOUND THE (_PARAMETER_CAPS_), HAVE YE?
send hortbot #foobar WOW command pan added

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+bullet COOL
send hortbot #foobar COOL bullet changed to COOL

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+bullet reset
send hortbot #foobar WOW bullet reset to default

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+bullet
send hortbot #foobar WOW bullet is WOW (default)
